channel.title: Need minor help
channel.description:
ok i have 3 problems, im a server coder, and im trying to make a client now, its not working out so good lol i have 3 things i can figure out ~ i cant get my custom santa hat to equip on hat section, instead of weapon slot ~i cant find the models for items, so i can only recode a few items, anyone have a thing with all the models ~ and cant get the whip is custome, but when i equip it it looks like a normal whip
if anyone can help with any of these it would be apprecicated ty people
